ingredients.@value: + Optional: Flour (to help with non-sticking to cutter)
+ Pizza dough or type of bread (English Muffins, Biscuit Dough, etc.)
+ Heart cookie cutter (a little larger for a bigger pizza)

name.@value: Mini Heart Pizzas with a Sweetheart Drink

recipeInstructions.@value: Pour Strawberry (or Cherry) soda into a glass
Cook just until cheese is melted (about 1-2 minutes) in a toaster oven, conventional oven or microwave.
Top with Whipped Cream, & Sprinkles or Crushed Sweethearts.
Add 2 scoops of the Vanilla ice cream.
Spread on the sauce, add your cheese, and include your toppings (Fun Tip: Use your toppings to create smiley faces or more heart shapes).

Start off by rolling out the dough, and using a heart shaped cookie cutter dipped in flour (helps prevent sticking) to cut out your pizzas. (If you choose to use English Muffins, [adults] place the cookie cutter on the muffin, and use a knife to cut out the heart shape.
Cook your dough according to the recipe but take out a 1-2 minutes earlier. (or toast the English Muffins as well 1 minute)
